table_description: Organizational Units in the Google Workspace domain.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the organizational unit.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the organizational unit.

columns.name: blockInheritance
columns.description: Indicates if inheritance of organizational unit settings is blocked.

columns.name: orgUnitId
columns.description: The unique ID of the organizational unit.

columns.name: orgUnitPath
columns.description: The full path of the organizational unit in the domain.

columns.name: parentOrgUnitId
columns.description: The ID of the parent organizational unit.

columns.name: parentOrgUnitPath
columns.description: The path of the parent organizational unit.
